Articles.Content: How will we create colonies and later add new parts to it? And what will the editor categories be for colony parts?

We dont know a lot yet, but once you've begun establishing your colony there will be something called a BAE or Base Assembly Editor that will allow you to add to and re-arrange colonies similar to the way we do vessels in the VAB. We don't know what the categories will be, or even much about what different types of modules will be available yet.
we dont know but its pretty safe to assume housing,  mining, vab type buildings. and we have actually seen power generators and runways
But how will we CREATE new colonies?

30 minutes ago, qwery123 said:

But how will we CREATE new colonies?

There is no clear explanation on how new colonies will be created. The speculation on colony creation is the best guesses the individuals have on the subject.
